history.heading: Equipment designed, not specified by 3B001.d.14, for deposition assisted by remotely generated 'radicals', enabling the fabrication of a silicon (Si) and carbon (C) containing film, and having all of the following properties of the deposited film:
history.title: Equipment designed, not specified by 3B001.d.14, for deposition assisted by remotely generated 'radicals', enabling the fabrication of a silicon (Si) and carbon (C) containing film, and having all of the following properties of the deposited film:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment as follows:
history.text:
Equipment designed, not specified by 3B001.d.14, for deposition assisted by remotely generated 'radicals', enabling the fabrication of a silicon (Si) and carbon (C) containing film, and having all of the following properties of the deposited film:
A dielectric constant (k) of less than 5.3;
d.1.a. A dielectric constant (k) of less than 5.3;
In features with an aspect ratio greater than 5:1 with lateral openings of less than 70 nm; and
d.1.b. In features with an aspect ratio greater than 5:1 with lateral openings of less than 70 nm; and
A feature-to-feature pitch of less than 100 nm.
d.1.c. A feature-to-feature pitch of less than 100 nm.
